metadata.title: CVE-2020-6440 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in extensions in Google Chrome prior to81.0.4044.92 allowed an attacker who convinced a user to install amalicious extension to obtain potentially sensitive information via acrafted Chrome Extension.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
